name: I Spent 30 HOURS on an Indian Sleeper Train. It was BRUTAL
description:
Thank you to BetterHelp for sponsoring this video. Get 10% off your first month at https://betterhelp.com/noel

I spent 30 hours travelling across India on an Indian sleeper train. It turned into a more brutal journey than I imagined.
